get.summary: Get associated properties for a policy
get.description: Run this operation to return the complete list of property associations for a specific policy with a given `policyId`.

200.description: Returns information about the associated properties.

schema.description: Contains information about the newest property version and the property’s current configuration on the production and staging networks for a specific `policyId`.

name.description: The name of the property. This value also appears at the start of each separate property object.

groupId.description: The group association for the property.

newestVersion.description: Contains information about the newest property version.

items.description: Contains information about the newest property version and the property’s current configuration on the production and staging networks for a specific `policyId`.

version.description: The version number of the property.

activatedBy.description: The name of the user who activated property.

activationDate.description: The date, in ISO 8601 format indicating when the property was activated.

cloudletsOrigins.description: Contains information about each conditional origin.

type.description: The type of origin this conditional origin is set up as. In this response the conditonal origin `type` is `APPLICATION_LOAD_BALANCER`.

description.description: The description of the load balancing configuration provided by a user.

checksum.description: The checksum that distinguishes this conditional origin from any others that might share the same name.

type.description: The type of origin this conditional origin is set up as, in this case `CUSTOMER`.

checksum.description: The checksum that distinguishes this conditional origin from any others that might share the same name.

hostname.description: The name of the host that can be used as a conditional origin.

type.description: The type of origin this conditional origin is set up as, in this case `NETSTORAGE`.

checksum.description: The checksum that distinguishes this conditional origin from any others that might share the same name.

hostname.description: The name of the host that can be used as a conditional origin.

referencedPolicies.description: The names of Cloudlets policies for this version of the property.

production.description: Contains information about the property’s current configuration on the `production` network.

items.description: Contains information about the newest property version and the property’s current configuration on the production and staging networks for a specific `policyId`.

version.description: The version number of the property.

activatedBy.description: The name of the user who activated property.

activationDate.description: The date, in ISO 8601 format indicating when the property was activated.

description.description: The description of the load balancing configuration provided by a user.

checksum.description: The checksum that distinguishes this conditional origin from any others that might share the same name.

type.description: The type of origin this conditional origin is set up as, in this case `CUSTOMER`.

checksum.description: The checksum that distinguishes this conditional origin from any others that might share the same name.

hostname.description: The name of the host that can be used as a conditional origin.

type.description: The type of origin this conditional origin is set up as, in this case `NETSTORAGE`.

checksum.description: The checksum that distinguishes this conditional origin from any others that might share the same name.

hostname.description: The name of the host that can be used as a conditional origin.

referencedPolicies.description: The names of Cloudlets policies for this version of the property.

staging.description: Contains information about the property’s current configuration on the `staging` network.

items.description: Contains information about the newest property version and the property’s current configuration on the production and staging networks for a specific `policyId`.

version.description: The version number of the property.

activatedBy.description: The name of the user who activated property.
